item.description: The Walk for Farm Animals raises vital funds for Farm Sanctuaryâ€™s lifesaving work and brings together thousands of people to change hearts and minds about farm animals - the purpose is to protect farm animals from cruelty, to inspire change in the way society views and treats farm animals, and to promote compassionate vegan living. I hope you all can make it! http://events.walkforfarmanimals.org/event/hartford.
